summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9654 lux) and cloud levels (up 324 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15058 lux), cloud levels (up 1903 m), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and outside temperature (up 2.2°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 323.8m lower than yesterday, 833.0m lower than the past week, 1903.3m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 743.1m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1576.2m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, very clammy and humid and calm and still conditions are expected. Moderate rainfall, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and the light is absent. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
